items.preText: 7.44pm Hello again, folks. Whose more nervous at the break, you reckon? Remember it may be 239, but that's 239 runs on the board for Bangladesh. No Shakib with the ball tonight as well. Mashrafe leads the huddle near the boundary before the team walks out. Fakhar and Imam make their way into the middle as well. Bangladesh to start with spin. Here's Mehidy. Zubair : "If Bangladesh manages to get some early wickets they are going to be favourites of winning it." -- yep, wickets at the top will be key. And so will the wicket of Shoaib Malik. Irtaza: "What if this match ends in a tie" -- whoever has the higher NRR will go through, which currently is Pakistan. I highly doubt we'll have back-to-back ties in ODIs though.
items.text: full and wide from around the wicket, and Fakhar cracks a cut to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Fakhar Zaman, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump. Angling into Fakhar, and defended with soft hands
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Fakhar Zaman, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and he punches this down the ground to mid off to get off the mark
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he defends this towards the leg side with the angled bat. Square leg cleans up
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and he drills this straight to mid on! This is hit very hard but Rubel throws himself into the air, and the ball sticks in his hand! Another failure for Fakhar. This is an extraordinary catch. Fakhar looks shellshocked after using his feet to get to the delivery's pitch.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Fakhar Zaman, OUT

dismissal.text: Fakhar Zaman c Rubel Hossain b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 1 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

items.text: good length on off, and spinning into the right-hander. Punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Babar Azam, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and angling further away. He tries to drive through the covers, but the ball hits the inside-half of his bat and dribbles back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Babar Azam, no run

items.text: big shout for lbw! And given. Full on middle and leg, and the ball skids straight through. Babar tries to defend from near his pads, but the ball stays low and hits his front back leg. Imam suggests Babar shouldn't review. He's walking back. Impact was in front of off stump.
items.postText: Ayan Sarkar: "Pakistan is facing Fizz for the first time is the history of ODI"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Babar Azam, OUT

dismissal.text: Babar Azam lbw b Mustafizur Rahman 1 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

items.text: full outside leg stump, and swinging further away. Sarfraz misses the flick and Mushfiqur dives to his left to intercept
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 wide

items.text: full just outside off, and this cover drive has been caressed through the off side! Beautiful shot to get off the mark. Just a simple push and the outfield does the rest
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on leg stump, and that's been flicked off his pads to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, and he works this off his pads to deep backward square
items.postText: Jmani: "Absolute brain fade from Fakhar. That was needless, unnecessary, futile and over ambitious. He opened the flood gates and his wicket brought an other one for Bangladesh! Very very immature shot"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off stump, and he blocks off the front foot. The ball dribbles away to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.preText: Rajesh : "Ooh !!! Sarfraz under pressure... He hasn't proved much of his stability in this series yet and this is a great opportunity."
items.text: full on off stump, and turning into the batsman. Tapped off the front foot to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to check a drive to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run

items.preText: around the wicket to Imam, with a slip in place
items.text: length ball just outside off, and spinning away. Defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and this is driven straight to cover. They want the single, but the ball has gone straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and worked off his toes to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText: Saf: "Not a brain fade. A bit too premeditated perhaps, but that's his role. He's given the license to go out and play such a game, even with the risk involved. "
items.text: good length on off, and he taps this with the spin off the back foot. The ball rolls away to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run

items.text: length ball angling in, and he whips this off his pads to the leg side for a single
items.postText: Zia: "Pakistan team is back to Misbah Ul Haq era... JK getting wickets... Pakistan batting starting with 1/1..2/2....3/3... Then captain comes to rescue... But!!!! can Sarfraz play a Misbah here??? "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside leg stump, and this has been easily nudged off his hips! Played fine, and races away to the fine-leg boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR runs

items.text: edged to the keeper! Full outside off, and angling further away. Sarfraz tries to drive this away from his body, but the ball takes the feather-edge and the catch is gobbled by the diving keeper to his right. Excellent work in the field by Bangladesh thus far. Another failure for Sarfraz
items.postText: Afsar: "Whoah!! Woah!! Dream!! Dream start for Bangladesh!!!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT

dismissal.text: Sarfraz Ahmed c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mustafizur Rahman 10 (7b 2x4 0x6) SR: 142.85

items.preText: Remember, Bangladesh were 12 for 3 at one stage. Can Malik and Imam do a Mushfiqur-Mithun?
items.text: good length on middle, and he walks to the off side, before defending off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on off and Malik offers the bat's full face to mid off. Hesitation in the run, but Mahmudullah fails to gather the ball. He was looking at the batsmen, instead of looking at the ball. Malik would've been out if the collection was clean
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, and angling down leg. Imam misses the flick, and the ball goes through to the keeper
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 wide
